page.title: 10Bredwardine; Education.
page.content: There is no school in the area. Most infants and juniors in Bredwardine go to school in Clifford; those in Brobury go to Staunton-on-Wye. Senior pupils attend school in Kingstone or Hereford. All the children are therefore dependent on school buses. The former school in Bredwardine is now run privately as an Outdoor Centre (Bredwardine Lodge), and an earlier school is now a private house. Facilities for further education are available in Hereford but participation by students in evening classes is severely limited by lack of public transport at the required time.
